Grand Maste Brome:
End of the world, the destruction, the agony... The wave of terror veil shrouds the earth... We must admit that we are, Kamael, can not go against this evil fate. And we will share it with all living things... But we can still prevent trouble. For this to occur, these young travelers, as you gain experience soon.
Now you have reached a certain bound in its development and do not know how to become stronger. My mission - to help you find the way that you were not able to determine for yourself... You are ready to accept their fate?
"I want to receive new force."
